title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 77.4 - Branch offices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 77.4 - Branch offices

State Regulations

Licensed private service bureaus desiring to operate a
branch office shall make application for this privilege on a form provided by
the department. If the application is approved, the branch office may be
operated under the license issued for the principal place of business, provided
a certified photostat copy of the license is obtained from the department upon
payment of the proper fee and displayed conspicuously in the branch
office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
77.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
